name: Harmontown
bio: Self destructive writer Dan Harmon ("Community," "Rick and Morty," "Heat Vision and Jack") claims he will one day found a colony of like-minded misfits. He's appointed suit-clad gadabout Jeff Davis ("Whose Line is it Anyway?") as his Comptroller.
copy: Self-destructive writer Dan Harmon ("Community," "Rick and Morty," "Heat Vision and Jack") claims he will one day found a colony of like-minded misfits. He's appointed suit-clad gadabout Jeff Davis ("Whose Line is it Anyway?") as his Comptroller.
